statements.select: SELECT count(*) FROM dbo.AtSummonDetail WHERE Lending=#lending# and SubjectId=#subjectId#
SELECT * FROM AtSummonDetail WHERE SummonId IN (SELECT AtSummon.SummonId FROM AtSummon WHERE SummonDate BETWEEN #startDate# AND #endDate#) AND SummonCatetory = #SumonCatetoryType#
select * from AtSummonDetail where SummonId in (select SummonId from AtSummon where SummonDate between #startdate# and #enddate# ) $sql$
SELECT * FROM AtSummonDetail WHERE SummonId in (select SummonId from AtSummon where SummonDate between #startdate# AND #enddate#) ORDER BY SummonId

SELECT isnull(sum(CASE WHEN d.Lending = '貸' then 0-d.Amoney WHEN d.Lending = '借' then d.Amoney end),0) FROM AtSummonDetail d LEFT JOIN AtSummon h ON h.SummonId = d.SummonId WHERE h.SummonDate < #startdate# and d.SubjectId = #subjectid#
SELECT d.* FROM AtSummonDetail d LEFT JOIN AtSummon h ON h.SummonId = d.SummonId WHERE d.SubjectId = #subjectid# AND h.SummonDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# ORDER BY h.SummonDate ASC

select * from ( SELECT d.*,h.SummonDate FROM AtSummonDetail d LEFT JOIN AtSummon h ON h.SummonId = d.SummonId WHERE d.SubjectId = #subjectid# AND h.SummonDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# UNION SELECT NULL AS [SummonDetailId],NULL AS [BillCode],h.SummonId AS [SummonId],h.SummonCategory AS [SummonCategory], CASE h.SummonCategory WHEN '現金支出傳票' THEN '貸' WHEN '現金收入傳票' THEN '借' END AS [Lending], null AS [SubjectId], CASE h.SummonCategory WHEN '現金支出傳票' THEN h.TotalDebits WHEN '現金收入傳票' THEN h.CreditTotal END as [AMoney], NULL AS [Summary],NULL AS [DepartmentId],NULL AS [ProjectId],NULL AS [OffsettingSummon],NULL AS [DebitMoney],NULL AS [CreditMoney],NULL AS [InsertTime],NULL AS [UpdateTime],NULL AS [Id],h.SummonDate FROM AtSummonDetail d LEFT JOIN AtSummon h ON h.SummonId = d.SummonId WHERE (h.SummonCategory = '現金支出傳票' OR h.SummonCategory = '現金收入傳票') AND h.SummonDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# ) a order by a.SummonDate asc
